actions.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete '{{name}}'?

vote.fullDescription: This session is already full, and you may not have a spot unless someone changes their mind. Do you want to join anyway?

form.pastAlert: For a past session you can only edit the links
form.namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the session
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description of the session
form.previewEmpty: _Nothing to preview. Write a description and preview it here_
form.durationPlaceholder: Pick the duration of the session
form.typePlaceholder: Pick a type for the session
form.levelPlaceholder: Pick a level for the session
form.tracksPlaceholder: Pick one or more tracks for the session
form.hostsPlaceholder: Pick one or more hosts for the session
form.meetingPlaceholder: Enter a link to a virtual meeting
form.slidesPlaceholder: Enter a link to any slides you want to share
form.recordingsPlaceholder: Enter a link to a recording of the session
form.feedbackPlaceholder: Enter a link to a feedback form
form.eventPlaceholder: Pick an event for the session
form.eventDescription: Adding a session to an event takes it out of draft and makes it visible to participants

markdown.hint: You can format your description using markdown. Click here to toggle cheat sheet
markdown.link: A complete list of syntax options can be found on
